text.tspan: GDP per capita vs. median income or consumption per day, 2020
This data is adjusted for inflation and for differences in the cost of living between countries.
Median income or expenditure per day
Note: This data is measured in international-$ at 2017 prices. Depending on the country and year, it relates to either disposable income or
Data source: World Bank Poverty and Inequality Platform
